I hope this message finds you well. I’ve been reflecting on my actions lately, and I feel compelled to reach out and sincerely apologize for forgetting your birthday. I can’t express how regretful I am for missing such an important day in your life.

You mean a great deal to me, and it hurts to think that I didn’t show you the love and appreciation you deserve on your special day. I can only imagine how disappointing it must have been, and I deeply regret that I wasn’t there to celebrate with you. Please know that it wasn't my intention to overlook you, and I genuinely feel terrible about it.

I value our friendship immensely, and I want to make it right. If you’re open to it, I would love to take you out for coffee or dinner soon—my treat. It would mean a lot to me to catch up, celebrate you properly, and show you how much you truly mean to me.

Thank you for your understanding and for being such a wonderful friend. I hope to hear from you soon.

With heartfelt apologies,  
[Your Name]

Dear [Friend's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to sincerely apologize for forgetting your birthday. It was never my intention to overlook such an important occasion in your life, and I deeply regret not being there to celebrate with you.

Your birthday is a significant day, and you deserve to be honored and cherished on that occasion. I am truly sorry for any disappointment my forgetfulness may have caused you. Please know that our friendship means a great deal to me, and I value the moments we share.

To make amends, I would love to take you out for dinner or do something special together, at your convenience. It would be a great opportunity for me to celebrate you, even if belatedly. 

Thank you for your understanding and patience. I appreciate having you in my life, and I look forward to making it up to you.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
